edu.harvard.chs.cite
[Groovy] Class TextInventory

java.lang.Object
  edu.harvard.chs.cite.TextInventory

class TextInventory

Class modelling a TextInventory. Methods for finding artifacts in the TextInventory appear in two forms:

  • an internal "private" method returning a TextInventory class data structure. These methods have 'Data' in their names.
  • a public method returning URN values or String values
The internal 'Data' methods should not be used: internal data structures may change. The URN and String methods are stable. They will not change their signature and should produce identical results even if the underlying implementation changes.

Property Detail

citationModelMap

java.lang.Object citationModelMap
Map of Cts Urns to corresponding CitationModel object. The map should include an entry for every citable work in the inventory.

ctsnamespaces

java.lang.Object ctsnamespaces
A list of namespace triplets. Each CTS namespace is comprised of a namespace abbreviation, a full URI, and a description.

ctsns

static groovy ctsns
XML namespace for the CTS vocabulary.

debug

java.lang.Integer debug
Debugging level.

editions

java.lang.Object editions
A list of version-level structures. Each version-level structure is comprised of a CTS URN for the version, a label, a boolean flag indicating whether or not this version is online, and a parent (work) URN.

enc

java.lang.String enc
Character encoding to use when representing TextInventory as a File object.

errorList

java.lang.Object errorList
List of data values that violate the TextInventory definition.

nsMapList

java.lang.Object nsMapList
Map of Cts Urns to XML namespace mappings.

onlineMap

java.lang.Object onlineMap
Map of Cts Urns to corresponding value of online attribute. The map should include an entry for every online version in the inventory.

textgroups

java.lang.Object textgroups
A list of textgroup structures. Each textgroup structure is comprised of a CTS urn and a label. Although the XML schema for a TextInventory allows multiple labels for a textgroup, this data structure keeps only one.

ti

static groovy ti
XML namespace for the TextInventory vocabulary.

tiVersion

java.lang.Object tiVersion
The TextInventory ID. In an XML serialization validating against the TextInventory schema, this is the tiid attribute on the root element.

translationLanguages

java.lang.Object translationLanguages
Map of version-level Cts Urns to ISO three-letter language codes.

translations

java.lang.Object translations
A list of version-level structures. Each version-level structure is comprised of a CTS URN for the version, a label, a boolean flag indicating whether or not this version is online, and a parent (work) URN.

works

java.lang.Object works
A list of work structures. Each work structure is comprised of a CTS URN, a title, and a parent (textgroup) URN. (A full work-level URN can therefore be composed by joining the work-level URN and the work ID). Although the XML schema for a TextInventory allows multiple titles for a work, this data structure keeps only one.

worksLanguages

java.lang.Object worksLanguages
Map of work-level Cts Urns to ISO three-letter language codes.

checkCtsNsDecl

void checkCtsNsDecl(groovy.util.Node root)
Verifies that all textgroups belong to a CTS namespace declared by a ctsnamespace element in the XML representation of a TextInventory. Adds a one-line description of each error found to errorList.
Parameters:
root - Parsed root element of the inventory.

checkDataValues

void checkDataValues(groovy.util.Node root)
Verifies that data values in the inventory comply with a number of constraints of the CTS specification. These include:
  • All URNs must be properly placed in their inherited hierarchy
  • A CTS namespace must be declared for all text groups
  • xml:lang attributes should be 3-char abbrs and xml:lang for translations should not be equal to the xml:lang value for the notional work
  • recursively checks the XPath values of scope and xpath attributes on all citationMappings and verifies that all XML namespaces are declared.

checkLangAttrs

void checkLangAttrs(groovy.util.Node root)
Verifies that values of xml:lang for translation elements is not identical to the xml:lang value of the parent work.

checkUrnHierarchy

void checkUrnHierarchy(groovy.util.Node root)
Verifies that all URNs for works and versions agree with their parent element. Adds a one-line text description of each error found to errorList.
Parameters:
root - Parsed root element of the inventory.

checkXPath

void checkXPath(groovy.util.Node citeNode, java.util.ArrayList validList, java.lang.String urn)
Verifies that all XML namespace abbreviations appearing in the TextInventory's citation node structure for a given edition are in a list of valid XML namespace abbreviations.
Parameters:
citeNode - The citation node element for a given edition, as a parsed groovy.util.Node.
validList - A list of Strings giving all XML namespace abbreviations defined for the given edition.
urn - The CTS URN identifying the edition in question.

checkXmlNsUsage

void checkXmlNsUsage(groovy.util.Node root)
For every edition in the inventory, verifies that all XML namespace abbreviations appearing in XPath expressions are defined in namespace definitions.
Parameters:
root - Root node of the TextInventory, as a parsed groovy.util.Node.

onlineDataForWork

java.lang.Object onlineDataForWork(java.lang.String s)
"Private" or internal method finds version-level data structures for all versions available online for a given CTS URN.
returns:
A (possibly empty) List of version-level data structures.
throws:
Exception if s is not a valid CtsUrn String
Parameters:
u - A CTS URN to check for This URN may include either a work- or version-level reference to the work: it is trimmed to the work level before searching. If u is given at the text group level, it is not an error, but the returned list will be empty.

Exception if s is not a valid CtsUrn String
Parameters:
s - A String representing the CTS URN to search for. This URN may include either a work- or version-level reference to the work: * it is trimmed to the work level before searching. If u is given at the text group level, it is not an error, but the returned list will be empty.

workTitle

java.lang.Object workTitle(CtsUrn u)
Gets a reabable name for a work identified by URN.
returns:
A String with a human-readlabe name for the work, or null if no work is found for the requested URN.
Parameters:
u - CTS URN identifying the work to label.

workTitle

java.lang.Object workTitle(java.lang.String s)
Creates reabable name for a work identified by URN.
returns:
A String with a human-readlabe name for the work, or null if no work is found for the requested URN.
throws:
Exception if s is not a valid CtsUrn String
Parameters:
u - URN identifying the work to label.

worksDataForGroup

java.lang.Object worksDataForGroup(java.lang.String s)
"Private" or internal method finds work-level data structures for all works available online for the textgroup of a given CTS URN.
returns:
A (possibly empty) List of work-level data structures.
throws:
Exception if s is not a valid CtsUrn String
Parameters:
u - A CTS URN to check for.

worksDataForGroup

java.lang.Object worksDataForGroup(CtsUrn u)
"Private" or internal method finds work-level data structures for all works available online for the textgroup of a given CTS URN.
returns:
A (possibly empty) List of work-level data structures.
Parameters:
u - CTS URN of a textgroup to check for.

A (possibly empty) List of work-level data structures.
Parameters:
u - A CTS URN to check for.

xmlNsForVersion

java.util.LinkedHashMap xmlNsForVersion(java.lang.String urnStr)
Finds a map of the XML namespace abbreviations used in a specific version of a document to full URIs for the XML namespace.
returns:
A map of XML namespace abbreviations to URI values.
throws:
Exception if urnStr is not a valid Cts Urn value.
Parameters:
urnStr - Version-level Cts Urn string for the document in question.

xmlNsForVersion

java.util.LinkedHashMap xmlNsForVersion(CtsUrn urn)
Finds a map of the XML namespace abbreviations used in a specific version of a document to full URIs for the XML namespace.
returns:
A map of XML namespace abbreviations to URI values.
Parameters:
urn - Version-level Cts Urn for the document in question.
